title: Different image size for showImageForEmptyUri
body: How can I set Different image size for showImageForEmptyUri ?
author: aser58

comments.body: You can pass Drawable int o this method. So you can define a size.

I indeed pass drawable to this method :".showImageForEmptyUri(R.drawable.globe2)"

The size of glob2 is 24x24 , but when it shown in the listview is strched to full all the frame of the imageView.

How I can define that when there is no Uri the image will not sreched ?

Thanks
I think `android:scaleType` parameter is responsible for that.
